verbose_text: To evaluate the role of GS in the polarization of blood derived human macrophages, we first tested GS protein expression in primary human resting macrophages (M0/resting), those with a proinflammatory phenotype (M1) induced by LPS / IFNgamma, and with the alternatively activated phenotype (M2) elicited with IL-4 and IL-10, alone or in combination, or otherwise with a combination of the anti-inflammatory cytokines IL-4 and IL-13 with an overlapping function.
